snippet.title: The Last Case of Benedict Fox: Definitive Edition - Official PS5 Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Last Case of Benedict Fox: Definitive Edition is a cinematic and Lovecraftian 2D action platformer developed by Plot Twist Studio. Players will enter a gothic-era Boston as Benedict Fox on a journey to uncover the truth behind a mystifying family tragedy while answering to the whims of a demon that possesses his soul. The game is now heading to PlayStation 5 in the form of the Definitive Edition offering dramatic control and speed improvements to combat and platforming gameplay, enhancements to visuals, UI, enemy AI, puzzles, new gameplay features, and more. The Last Case of Benedict Fox: Definitive Edition is launching soon for PlayStation 5.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
